briefTitle: A Long-term Study of ERN/LRPT (Extended Release Niacin/Laropiprant [MK0524A]) in Patients With Dyslipidemia (0524A-102)
officialTitle: A Worldwide, Multicenter, Double-Blind, Randomized, Parallel, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Long-term Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of ERN/LRPT in Patients With Dyslipidemia
summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy of laropiprant (LRPT) to reduce flushing symptoms beyond 6 months and will measure the impact of withdrawal of laropiprant in patients following 20 weeks of stable maintenance therapy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number Participants With Days Per Week With Global Flushing Severity Score (GFSS) â‰¥4 Partitioned Into 6 Categories During the Postwithdrawal Period
